name: Cloud Clashers
description:
Cloud Clashers is a sports mash-up of soccer and ping pong where two players use selected abilities to score in the opponents goal. Players choose wacky characters such as Deers, Ducks, Unicorns, and Eagles combined with the abilities they want to use during the match. When the player either scores the set amount of points or the timer runs out a winner will be declared for that round. Rounds last 60 seconds each being played best two out of three to give players the opportunities to adjust

Check out our team Antoine Harris - Programmer Shayne Shekon - Artist SenseiJosh - Musician TheSeanInc - Arist/Animator Isaiah Braddock - Artist
